inputs.name: _header
inputs.description: A Ladybug header object describing the metadata of the data collection.

inputs.name: _values
inputs.description: A list of numerical values for the data collection.

inputs.name: _interval_
inputs.description:
Text to indicate the time interval of the data collection, which
determines the type of collection that is output. (Default: hourly).
_
Choose from the following:
- hourly
- daily
- monthly
- monthly-per-hour
_
Note that the "hourly" input is also used to represent sub-hourly
intervals (in this case, the timestep of the analysis period
must not be 1).

name: LB Construct Data
description:
Construct a Ladybug data collection from header and values.
-
